problem.markdown:
The company decided that it did not want to store all those parts so it decided not to store any parts between the mill and the drill. How long will it take to produce 24,000 parts? Assume the up-times and down-times are geometrically distributed.
>>How many hours will it take to produce 24,000 parts? Assume the up-times and down-times are geometrically distributed. Round to the nearest integer.<<
